backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: JSON scaffold for a feature evidence report with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling all page sections using listing data.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Footer showing agent contact info, property disclaimer, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Gallery grid with a keyboard-accessible lightbox for full-size image viewing.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner showing property address, tagline, status badge, and background image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Highlig: Section listing property highlights with checkmark icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/KeyDeta: Displays key property stats and an inquiry phone link using card-like detail blocks.
frontend/src/data/listing.ts: Defines ListingData interface and exports static listing details for the sold property.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and updating a backend actor based on Internet Identity, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing since no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with accessibility-focused focus styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color tokens, typography, container queries, animations, and custom fonts and radius settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including version, summary, project name, and empty feature request structures.
